Name: Turning Leaves
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE oregano and cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Norwegian Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail created by Mathias Bengt Alsenalissa at Brooms & Hatchets in Oslo.
